description: DTEK, an independent power producer in Ukraine, has enlisted Fluence to provide a 200MW/400MWh battery energy storage system (BESS) to enhance grid support.
Fluence Energy has been contracted to deliver 200 MW of battery storage across Ukraine, helping to enhance grid reliability through storage at six different sites.
GÜRİŞ is continuing the development of new wind, solar, and energy storage projects in Ukraine, supporting the country's energy independence.
SPP Development Ukraine has unveiled a new 200 MW BESS project, aimed at securing energy supply and improving network stability in the region.
Ukraine has added over 860 MW of renewable energy capacity in a recent auction, part of which includes new BESS projects to enhance stability.
